title: Compiler panic on on_disk_cache

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Hey,

I stumbled upon some an error while trying to run my code using `cargo run` (running `cargo check` works just fine). My code that errors can be found here: https://github.com/drager/handle/tree/with-handle3. The `master-bug` branch works fine however and can be run without errors: https://github.com/drager/handle/tree/master-bug

**Other information**
Installed Rust via rustup
OS: Arch Linux x86_64

**Error**
Here's the full output from the attempt:
```cargo run     
   Compiling handler v0.1.0 (file:///home/drager/development/handle)
warning: field is never used: `config`
  --> src/main.rs:93:9
   |
93 |         config: &'a Config<'b>,
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
   = note: #[warn(dead_code)] on by default

warning: field is never used: `config`
   --> src/main.rs:217:9
    |
217 |         config: &'a Config,
    |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

warning: field is never used: `logger_handle`
   --> src/main.rs:219:9
    |
219 |         logger_handle: &'a logger::Handle<'b, 'b>,
    |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

thread 'main' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `105`,
 right: `49641`', librustc/ty/query/on_disk_cache.rs:532:5
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.28.0 (9634041f0 2018-07-30) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

error: Could not compile `handler`.
```

**Backtrace**:
```
thread 'main' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `105`,
 right: `49641`', librustc/ty/query/on_disk_cache.rs:532:5
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
             at libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:49

             at libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59

             at libstd/panicking.rs:413

  43: <unknown>
query stack during panic:
#0 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items
end of query stack
```
